thread.title_full: Han Solo (2018 Movie): Cast Photo, News, Trailer, and Release Date | The Daily Dot

author: Gavia Baker-Whitelaw
title: Han Solo (2018 Movie): Cast Photo, News, Trailer, and Release Date | The Daily Dot
text:
Photo via Star Wars News about the heavily anticipated 'Star Wars' film is starting to trickle in. 
The as-yet-untitled Han Solo movie is the second Star Wars anthology film, following the standalone prequel Rogue One: A Star Wars Story . Taking place between Episode III and IV, it introduces us to a younger version of Han Solo, before he met Luke and Leia. Han Solo cast 
Alden Ehrenreich will star as Han Solo, following an extensive search for the ideal actor. He's joined by Donald Glover as Lando Calrissian, Woody Harrelson as Han's mentor, and Game of Thrones ' Emilia Clarke in an unnamed lead role. 
Joonas Suotama will take over as Chewbacca , after splitting the role with Peter Mayhew in The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi . Stoma wrote a personal note to Star Wars fans after his casting was confirmed, acknowledging how much the role meant to him. I'm ecstatic. It's official. And here is my statement to this terrific piece of news https://t.co/a1DPsNDb2P pic.twitter.com/r4EUZ2r17V — Joonas Suotamo (@JoonasSuotamo) February 21, 2017 On Feb. 21, the cast piled into the cockpit of the Millennium Falcon for the first official photo from Han Solo . 'Han Solo' movie cast photo Star Wars/Lucasfilm 
Westworld ’s Thandie Newton, whose exact role has not yet been revealed, is the only member of the main cast missing from the photo, a fact she poked fun at on Twitter. I'm the huge *invisible* SheBeast next to Chewbacca - BOOM! XT A new Star Wars Story begins. https://t.co/9zQqMZ1AOL pic.twitter.com/vCb6oRk7gf — Thandie Newton (@thandienewton) February 21, 2017 English actress Phoebe Waller-Bridge has also signed on to play a CGI character—possibly the franchise's first female droid in a lead role. Han Solo 's place in the Star Wars franchise 
Disney hasn't revealed the spinoff's exact place in the Star Wars timeline, but we do know that it takes place before A New Hope . At 27, Alden Ehrenreich is seven years younger than Harrison Ford was when he filmed A New Hope , although canonically, Han Solo was meant to be 29 at the time. Han Solo release date 
The movie began filming on Feb. 20, 2017, and it's slated for release on May 25, 2018. LucasFilm has not yet released a Hans Solo movie trailer, but we'll keep you posted.
